name: Rage-Free News - removes comments on news sites
description: This stylesheet removes comment counts and comments sections from major news sites, thereby lowering your blood pressure, maintaining the social order, and restoring your faith in humanity. Guaranteed! Sites covered: the CBC, Toronto Star, Daily Mail, CNN, and more! Did I miss a spot? Would you like the seething cesspit of craven mouthfarters that is your local paper's comments section to vanish from view? Let me know!
additional_info:
